name: Glacier Fresh Cherries
notes: Family-owned cherry orchard and custom packing house. Largest exporter of cherries in Montana. Packs cherries from approximately 115 acres (55 owned, 60 for other growers). Operates since 2005 for custom packing.

name: Flathead Lake Cherry Growers, Inc.
notes: Cooperative of approximately 70 cherry growers around Flathead Lake. Main packing facility operates on South Finley Point Road near Polson. Operated by Monson Fruit Company. Ships cherries from over 80 Flathead Lake orchards. Cherries shipped primarily to Selah, Washington for packaging and national/international distribution.

name: Mission Mountain Food Enterprise Center
notes: 13,000 sq ft shared-use food processing facility. FDA registered, USDA meat inspected, Certified Organic. Processes pitted sweet Flathead cherries, butternut squash cubes, roasted pie pumpkin puree, blanched green beans, diced onions, diced peppers, shredded zucchini, shredded carrots, cut carrot coins, cubed melons, bell pepper rings, cut cucumbers. Offers cherry pitting, dry mixing, packaging, labeling, and co-packing services. Operating since 2000.

name: Western Montana Growers Cooperative
address: 1500 Burns Street STE C, Missoula, MT 59802
notes: Farmer-owned cooperative with 30+ members and dozens of local/regional producers. Provides marketing, selling, packaging, and delivery of member produce. Delivers to 20+ sites in Western Montana from Missoula to Polson to Helena. Handles fresh/frozen vegetables, fresh/frozen fruits, and prepared foods.

name: Shelby Elevator (Ardent Mills)
notes: Grain elevator facility operated by Ardent Mills. Predominantly supports chickpea processing by loading farmer-delivered chickpeas onto rail cars for shipment to Washington processing facilities. Also handles wheat and grain operations.

name: New Century Ag - Westby Location
notes: Grain handling facility. Handles durum wheat, spring wheat, canola, peas, and lentils. Provides agronomy services including chemical, seed, inoculant, and fertilizer sales. Part of larger New Century Ag network.

name: Cream of the West
notes: Co-packing facility specializing in dry mixes, flour, grains, and tea products. Licensed Montana co-packer.

name: Montana Cookie Company
notes: Co-packing facility specializing in gluten-free cookies and snacks.

name: West Fork Creations
notes: Co-packing facility specializing in chocolate sauces and related products.

name: Roots Kitchen & Cannery
notes: Small-batch food manufacturing and canning co-packing facility. Provides commercial kitchen facilities for food preservation and processing.
